message.content:
cs.RO, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CV 

This paper discusses the language processing used on a mobile robot, which falls under the category of robotics (cs.RO). The paper also discusses how the robot learns new nouns and verbs, which involves natural language processing (cs.CL) and machine learning (cs.AI). Additionally, the paper mentions the use of gestures and handling of anaphora, which are related to language understanding (cs.LG). Finally, the paper mentions the use of perception for grounding language, which could involve computer vision (cs.CV).
